authors: Andrew Bailey (krathognis), Devindra Payment (@Ardnived), Maetco, and Joseph Cloutier (player-03)
instructions: # Fate Core Character Sheet## Hidden featuresSince not all campaigns use a third stress track or skills better than Superb (+5), these are hidden by default. To enable them, set "FantasticActive" and/or "ThirdStressActive" to "on". ([Detailed instructions here](https://imgur.com/a/PEIZ5G9).)
